original_text: When Jesus saw him lying there and learned that he had been in this condition for a long time, he asked him, “Do you want to get well?”
korean_text: 예수께서 그 누운 것을 보시고 병이 벌써 오래된 줄 아시고 이르시되 네가 낫고자 하느냐

sentences.original_text: When Jesus saw him lying there
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님이 그가 거기 누워 있는 것을 보셨을 때

sentences.original_text: and learned that he had been in this condition
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 이런 상태에 있었다는 것을 알고
